modal.header-subtitle: Select one of the following options to continue

modal.header-tooltip-desc: The wallet serves as an account to store and manage your digital assets on the blockchain.

modal.popup.phone-body: Your country code will be detected automatically, but if you're using a phone number from a different country, you'll need to enter the correct country code manually.

modal.social.policy: We do not store any data related to your social logins.

passwordless.error-invalid-link: Invalid verification link or link expired
passwordless.error-invalid-origin: Something went wrong, error code: E002
passwordless.error-max-retry-limit-reached: You have reached the limit for wrong attempts. Please restart the flow again to complete verification.
passwordless.error-no-mail-generated: No mail generated. Please initiate the passwordless flow first.
passwordless.error-no-sms-generated: No OTP generated. Please initiate the passwordless flow first.
passwordless.error-recaptcha-verification-failed: Captcha verification failed. Please try again.
passwordless.error-sending-sms-failed: There was an error sending an sms. Please try again.
